lede: Regional Accounts are accounts for regions, sub-regions and local areas of the UK, produced according to the same concepts and definitions used in the National Accounts.  These accounts allow comparisons between regions and comparisons of a region against a UK average. Key statistics here are regional Gross Value Added (GVA) statistics and figures on regional Gross Disposable Household Income.
name: Regional Accounts
